tokens.text: defines an animation controller document structure

title: Animation Controller Document
description: A Minecraft Bedrock Edition animation controller definition document. Animation controllers use a state machine to control which animations play based on conditions. They can transition between states based on Molang queries.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this animation controller file. Use '1.10.0' or later.

fields.title: Animation Controllers
fields.description: A dictionary of animation controller definitions. Keys are controller identifiers like 'controller.animation.entity.controller_name', values are controller objects with initial_state and states properties.
